help.description: Get the list of commands for the bot

language.description: Set the language for the server
language.setLanguage: Set the language for the server

welcomeChannel.name: welcomechannel
welcomeChannel.installedChannel: Welcome channel set to <#{{channelId}}>. To disable run /welcomechannel disable

leaveChannel.name: leavechannel
leaveChannel.installedChannel: Leave channel set to <#{{channelId}}>. To disabled run /leavechannel disable

joinToCreateChannel.installedChannel: "Join To Create" channel set to <#{{channelId}}>. To disabled run /jointocreate disable

bugReport.name: report
bugReport.description: Report a bug to the developer
bugReport.reportExists: You have already submitted a bug report

bugReport.title: BUG FINDER
bugReport.reportSent: Your report has been successfully sent to the developer

reportDetails.title: Your Bug Report
reportDetails.description: Thank you for submitting a bug report! Here are the details:

reportDescriptionInput.label: Detailed description of the problem
reportDescriptionInput.placeholder: Please provide a detailed description of what is not working correctly with the bot

setNameTempChannel.title: Change Channel Name
setNameTempChannel.label: Enter the new channel name
setNameTempChannel.renameCooldownMessage: You can rename the name no more often than every 5 minutes

setLimitTempChannel.title: Change Channel User Limit
setLimitTempChannel.label: Enter user limit
setLimitTempChannel.errorInvalidLimit: Please enter a valid user limit between 1 and 99

activityTitleInput.label: Activity Name
activityTitleInput.placeholder: Enter the activity title for forming a combat group

activityDescription.label: Reason for searching for a combat group
activityDescription.placeholder: What is the reason for the search, for example, "Playing in trails"

activityPlayersCount.label: Number of participants for search
activityPlayersCount.invalidNumberMessage: Please enter a valid number for the participant count field

fixedBug.name: Fix
fixedBug.succesFix: Your bug report has been resolved. Thank you for helping us improve!

joinToActivity.name: Join
joinToActivity.deletedActivity: Unable to find the associated activity
joinToActivity.alreadyInGroup: You are already a participant in this activity
joinToActivity.ownerCannotJoin: The creator cannot join the activity

leaveFromActivity.name: Leave
leaveFromActivity.deletedActivity: Unable to find the associated activity
leaveFromActivity.noInGroup: You are not a member of the group
leaveFromActivity.ownerCannotLeave: The creator cannot leave the activity. First, it needs to be closed

groupReady.name: Group ready!
groupReady.ownerOnly: This action is available only to the activity owner

events.developerOnly: This command may only be used by the developer
